caption.p: Inhibitory effect of the crude extracts: M5L of L. hirta ( A), M6LFr of A. ochroleuca ( B) and M4LS of A. porophyllum ( C); on the mycelium of C. gloeosporioides (A1, B1 and C1), P. clavispora (A2, B2 and C2) and L. pseudotheobromae (A3, B3 and C3), at a concentration of 5 mg/mL. The negative control was absolute ethanol ( D), and the positive control Thiabendazole ( E).
